title: Interpretation of seeing black dogs in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing black dogs in a dream for one girl: A girl has dreams in which she sees a group of black hounds chasing her. This girl’s life is full of negative people according to her dream and they want to harm her. The girl who dreamed that she bought a dog to protect the house in a dream and she loved this dog very much. It is possible that she will meet this The girl sees someone she trusts implicitly when he enters her life according to her dream. As for the single woman who has dreams in which a strong and ferocious dog is present, her dream indicates that she is sad and depressed. And this state of mind will last a long time, and God knows best. In addition, the unmarried girl who saw A dream in which you are playing with the black dog and having fun, you feel happy. It is a sign of anxiety, which means that soon you will hear unfavorable news from someone. An unmarried girl has a dream in which a scary black dog appears to her. It is a sign that the man will ask her out, but he will not He will be the right person for her. See also: Interpretation of dreams about black dogs chasing me. Interpretation of seeing black dogs in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman dreams that there are huge black dogs around her, she knows that she will be able to overcome and beat the dogs. According to this dream, she will have a great future in Her life, God willing, and she must make some effort to reach that future. If a married woman dreams that there are some small black dogs outside her house, and that the dogs want to enter, but she has a good door. This dream indicates that an evil person is trying to break into the house and with him A married woman will prevent him from doing so. In her dream, the woman sees herself running and a group of black hounds following her. This dream indicates that the woman has a debt hanging around her neck that she has not paid. Either she, her husband, or some of her relatives are the owners of this debt. Interpretation of seeing black dogs in a dream for a man and its meaning. If a man succeeds in preventing a pack of dogs from approaching the house in his dream that the dogs are outside. This dream foretells that he will have a lot of wealth and goodness. In addition, if the dreamer sees a group of black hounds and tries Escaping from them. It shows his ability to deceive his opponents. Read also: Seeing dogs running after me in a dream for a single woman. The meaning of seeing black dogs in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. If the pregnant woman sees in her dream that she has black dogs in her house, provided that the dogs do not attack any family member and that the The parents are disturbed by the presence of dogs. This dream portends a lot of goodness and livelihood for the residents of the house. A pregnant woman has a dream in which she sees a dog and a group of people who hate her. This is evidence that he will face a series of challenges that he will overcome, God willing. If the pregnant woman dreams that she has been exposed Being attacked by a group of dogs. The meaning of this dream is that the woman’s birth will be difficult, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing black dogs in a dream for young people and its meaning. If a young man sees black dogs in a dream, this may mean that he is trying in a way

title: What is the interpretation of water in a dream by Ibn Sirin.. The meaning of seeing water in a dream

preview.html: In this article, we will show you the interpretation of water in a dream by Ibn Sirin in detail. Water is the main source of life on planet Earth and for all living creatures, whether human, animal or plant. God Almighty said about that in His Noble Book in Surat Al-Anbiya (And We created from water every living thing) On the other hand, in the world of dreams, this vision carries many different connotations for the dreamer depending on the situation, as some dreamers predict goodness for her because it is one of God’s most important blessings. Does this vision have good symbols for the dreamer? We will learn this through the encyclopedia. Interpretation of water in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing a lot of water in a dream as a sign of the dreamer’s asceticism in life. In the case of walking on water, this vision is a sign of success, whether academically or professionally. It is good news for the dreamer to achieve what he wants. If the dreamer sees yellow water in a dream, this vision indicates that the dreamer will suffer from an illness. If the water is yellow in the dream and does not have a good smell, then this vision indicates the commission of prohibited acts, which is stealing money. If the water is unclean in the dream, then this vision is repulsive to the dreamer and indicates the obstacles that the dreamer faces in reality. If one sees in a dream that he is drinking a large amount of pure water and he is sick in reality. The vision heralds recovery. If the dreamer is honest and sees this vision in his dream. This means that his marriage will soon be on the good side.Whoever sees in his dream that he is drinking fresh water from a well and has committed sins. This vision is good news of his repentance to God Almighty. Drinking sweet water in a dream indicates that the dreamer is far from the path of sin, and is concerned and devoted to matters of his religion. But if the taste of the water is bitter. This means that he will suffer from bitterness in his life. To dream that you are drinking a large amount of water in the morning means that the dreamer will get money soon. Seeing clear water turning into cloudy water in a dream means that the dreamer’s situation will change for the worse, whether it is financial or financial. Health-wise, socially, or academically. One of the interpretations of unpleasant dreams is a dream of drinking salt water. This vision indicates that the dreamer will suffer from worries in his life, and if this water is dirty, it means that the dreamer will harm an influential person. When someone sees in his dream that he drank all the sea water. This means that he will enjoy blessings in his life, his financial conditions will improve and he will assume authority in his life. Filling the dreamer’s mouth with water in a dream indicates that there is a major diet on the way to him. Interpretation of a dream about running water: As for seeing running water in a dream, Ibn Sirin interpreted this vision as follows: It is one of the hated dreams that indicate crises, especially if it flows between homes. Sweet running water in the dream symbolizes that God Almighty will bless the dreamer’s livelihood and children and grant him stability and happiness. But if this water is salty. This means that the dreamer will be disturbed. An auspicious dream is to dream that you put your hand in fresh running water. These visions

title: I know the most important signs of fear in a single woman’s dream

preview.html: Fear in the dream of an unmarried woman. Fear can express the obsessions that make many people feel confused in reality and appear to them in their dreams as an image that the subconscious interprets for them, but what can fear in dreams symbolize if there is no justifiable reason? This is what we will learn in the following article, which contains many important interpretations that will help single women understand these concepts in a very clear way. Let us learn about them. Fear in a single woman’s dream: Seeing an unmarried woman in a dream is an indication that she will receive a lot of happy news in the period Coming, which will cause her happiness to a great extent. A girl’s dream of being afraid during her sleep and she was in an emotional state H. A relationship with a young man is evidence that she has sincere feelings and she hopes that she will soon ask her family for her hand in marriage and their relationship will be crowned with a blessed marriage. This matter will make her very happy. If she sees The dreamer in her dream that she is afraid and that she is a student, this means that she is going through a very difficult school year and this is causing her a lot of stress, but she will get the last grades and achieve impressive success. Because she has a very strong personality, she is in a position to decide on any matter she wants to do and achieve it regardless of the cost, and does not allow anyone to prevent her from her desire. Fear in a dream for an unmarried woman by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin interprets seeing a single woman in a dream as She has a high degree of self-esteem and does not expect others to evaluate her. She is a beauty that attracts attention and makes her desirable to young people, and she must be careful not to be deceived by anyone. If the dreamer sees in her dream that she is afraid, this symbolizes that she will be able to fulfill many of her desires in life and achieve what she was seeking, and this will make her very happy and increase her Her self-confidence. You will get a job that you have dreamed of for a long time and you will be so successful that others will be amazed at what you have been able to do. The Asrar Dream Interpretation website is a site specialized in dream interpretation in the Arab world. Just write: A site about dream interpretation secrets. Search for it on Google and get the correct interpretations. Fear and escape in a single woman’s dream: Seeing a single woman who is afraid of a specific person and running away from him is a sign of the close relationship that she has with him and what will bring her together soon from work or exposure to one of them in a difficult situation and the other will provide him with a lot of support to support him, even if the dreamer sees in her dream that she is afraid From her fiancé and running away from him, this is an indication that their marriage contract and marriage were approaching in a short time. While this vision. If the dreamer sees in her dream that she is afraid of a stranger and runs away from him, this symbolizes that she will soon meet a young man and enter into a relationship with him and they will spend very happy moments with him. It will happen to them in the coming period. Fear and crying in the dream of an unmarried woman. Seeing an unmarried woman afraid and crying in a dream is evidence that she will receive an offer of marriage from one of the rich men who enjoys a high status.

title: Interpretation of sucking a penis in a dream

preview.html: The interpretation of sucking a penis in a dream is one of the topics that raises many questions, and many people are in a hurry to know the interpretations of this vision. Because it is one of the unusual visions, many dream interpretation scholars have worked hard to explain these interpretations, and their interpretations vary depending on how penis sucking occurs. Seeing a woman sucking her husband’s penis is different from sucking other people’s penises, and interpretations vary depending on the viewer. Look at sucking your penis when you are single, not as you see it when you are married, and not as you see it when you are pregnant. Interpretation of sucking a penis in a dream. Interpretation of sucking a penis when free. If a single woman sees in her dream that she is sucking the penis of an unknown man. This is proof that this girl cannot control her sexual desires and also cannot satisfy her sexual acts in reality. He wants to please her in a dream, and if an unmarried woman sees in her dream that someone is forcing her to suck his penis. This is evidence that someone is trying to trap this girl with illegal things, and chase her all the time, but she does not want to do these things, and she is trying to get rid of this man but she cannot get rid of him. But if an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is sucking someone’s penis with her consent. This is evidence that this girl is performing forbidden actions, and that she does not investigate what is permissible and forbidden, just as this girl does not repent to God Almighty, and this is evidence that God Almighty. You will upset this woman. Until she comes to her senses and comes to her senses. This is an indication of the need to repent to God, return to Him, repent for what you have done, and resolve not to return to sin. So that she will not face a painful torment in this world and the hereafter, and God will not grant her success in this world, and this lack of success will be because God Almighty does not facilitate the means of marriage for her. Because she chose another path from God, and because this is her path. How does God guide her to what is permissible? Interpretation of seeing the penis being breastfed by a married woman: If a married woman sees in her dream that she is sucking the penis, this is evidence that marital life between her and her husband is happy, especially if her husband’s penis is erect, but if her husband’s penis is flaccid. This is evidence that her husband does not satisfy her sexual desires in reality, and that she is trying to satisfy these desires in her dream. Penis someone doesn't know. This is evidence that this woman is performing actions that do not please God and His Messenger, and that she is not faithful to her husband or her family. It is also evidence of her lack of love for her husband, but the reason for the marriage. He has the desire for a luxurious life and her greed for his abundant money, and the other women are the ones who suck her husband’s penis while he is happy. This is evidence that this man is cheating on his wife with another woman, and this may be because he is not comfortable with his wife in an intimate relationship, or because he is a bad man who does not have good morals, and this is a matter. An indication that the woman needs to improve his morals or work to make him happy. So that she does not fall into family corruption, but if her husband is sad and his wife sucks his penis. This is evidence that this woman is trying to ruin her life

title: Interpretation of seeing lions in a dream for a man and a woman

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the color black in a dream for a man and a woman, the color black in a dream has many different meanings, most of which are negative interpretations, the most important of which are dreams associated with different colors, whether they are happy and open or dark colors. Vague colors such as black are the colors that reflect part of a person's soul and emotional state at the time he saw the dream and his way of thinking about the events of his life, in this article we will learn together about the interpretation of the color black in a dream for a man and a woman. Interpretation of a dream of seeing black in a dream for a single woman The black color in the dream of an unmarried girl indicates her excellence in her studies and success in her professional life. The black color in the life of a single woman has nothing to do with her emotional life, so do not rely on it to determine the fate of her life emotionally. It is said that seeing the color black in a dream indicates that she will travel to a distant place for reasons related to work and will be far from her family and friends. If an unmarried girl sees that she is wearing black shoes, this dream indicates that a man will propose to her and that man will feel happy with him, and if she sees a lot of black shoes, this indicates the desire of many men. For this. He suggests to her. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a black dress in a dream for a man If black is one of the dreamer's favorite colors, and he sees in his dream that he is wearing black, then this dream is good news for him and that he will achieve what he wants. Otherwise, seeing him wearing black was not a good thing. And if a man sees himself wearing black, this is a sign for him that he will lose his money and change his condition to poverty, and it is a sign for him to pay more attention to trade and work hard to strengthen it. And it proves to him that he may not suffer a loss, and he must inquire about what is permissible in his trade so that God Almighty may provide for him and protect him from poverty and need. It is possible that seeing the color black is a sign of some problems that the dreamer will be able to get rid of soon. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a black dress in a dream If an unmarried girl sees that she is wearing a black dress, then this dream indicates the fears and difficulties that this girl will fall into. If she sees that she is elegant and happy when wearing a black dress, this indicates her confidence and strong personality that stands out in the presence of others. A married woman who sees herself wearing a black dress and looks elegant in it, and feels joyful in her dreams, this is good news that there is an improvement in her emotional distress with her husband and that he will notice her interest in him. Her husband in his next period, and this dream may indicate that he will obtain certificates and achieve success. In her professional life. And a pregnant woman who sees herself wearing a black dress, her vision indicates her fears of pregnancy and childbirth, but she must take medical reasons and take care of her diet according to the recommendation of the specialist doctor and submit her matter to God. . And do not worry. Interpretation of a dream of seeing a dead person wearing a black dress in a dream A young man who sees a dead person in a dream wearing black, then his dream indicates that the dreamer falls into many sins and is angry with God Almighty

title: The meaning of seeing pregnancy in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of pregnancy in a dreamChocolate candy, are considered promising visions of pregnancy in a dream, but this pregnancy will happen soon. The symbol of a watch and the use of bracelets for a married woman is an imminent pregnancy. Grape leaves in a dream are a symbol of pregnancy. An egg means ovulation and is a sign of pregnancy. If your husband sees a mobile phone He gives it to you, then this is pregnancy. BreastfeedingIf you see yourself breastfeeding a child, then you will have the same gender as the child that you saw in your dream. Cat, if you see a cat hanging on your clothes, then it is pregnancy. She dreams of a pregnant woman. The gifts that your husband gives you in a dream are pregnancy. Decorations , such as dreamy jewelry of bracelets and earrings, as well as pearls. If a woman sees that she is entering a special place that sells smart perfumes. Buying new clothes for children. title: Interpretation of keys in a dream: Seeing a key in a dream

preview.html: A dream of keys for a single woman, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a man, whether he took a key from someone or gave a key to someone. The car key was lost and the door was closed. Ibn Sirin and others. Interpretation of keys in a dream. Many keys in a dream indicate achieving authority and his position among the people. The key in a dream is one of the important symbols and its interpretation is linked to the viewer’s condition. The context of the dream and the shape of the key. The presence of a key in a dream indicates an important upcoming change in the dreamer’s life. The key in the dream indicates the invitation that was answered. Also, the key in the dream indicates victory over enemies, sustenance, and conquest. The key is interpreted as Hajj, marriage, gaining knowledge, or trade. Seeing a key Toothless in a dream indicates the injustice of an orphan. Seeing an iron key indicates a strong, powerful and dangerous man. Whoever opens a door or a lock with a key in a dream achieves what he wants and fulfills his need. Losing a key in a dream or losing it is difficulty and unpleasant events, and finding it is confirmation and a pleasant change in life. Breaking the key in a dream It is separation and separation. Giving a key in a dream means that a person always helps the poor. It helps everyone find a job, get married or start a home. It also expresses offering a share and a decent life to someone or giving him an opportunity, and from the Islamic point of view the dream shows a person who is always benevolent and whose morals are excellent. It also indicates some material losses as a result of wrong decisions or irrational behavior. It also expresses that whoever gets the key in the dream may give up his source of livelihood to people. Taking the key from someone the dreamer knows in a dream indicates great job opportunities if the dreamer is unemployed. The doors of wealth will open for him. As for the one who received the key in the dream, he will get married if he is single, but if he is married, he will obtain wealth. The key generally represents good opportunities, good luck, a new job, the purchase of a car or a new workplace. Whoever gets the key in the dream, his life will change and he will have a rich life. As for those who face problems and quarrels, they will be reconciled. Losing a key in a dream indicates separation from a loved one or leaving work and not making a good assessment of the available opportunities, which causes the person to feel extremely sad. Whoever loses the key in a dream will miss beautiful opportunities that can completely change his life. It also expresses the separation of a partnership and the poor condition of some businesses, as well as some material losses. Psychological Analysis To see giving a key in a dream, it indicates that there are some people close to this person who need help from them. In some cases, breaking up and fighting is beneficial and people want to have another chance. Psychologically, it refers to some situations and positions that require the desire to be lucky, and at the same time the dream shows the remorse and problems that the person is going through. Keys or key in the dream, its name comes from fatha, and fatha means relief, and the key is a tool that does not leave a pocket or bag of it that we use every... A day at home, at work, and in the car. The key in a dream is an important symbol and is related to its interpretation

title: Interpretation of a dream about Satan in human form

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about Satan in the form of a human The interpretation of a dream about Satan in the form of a man varies depending on the social status of the dreamer, and this dream is one of the visions that causes a lot of panic and fear, and some seek to interpret this vision because it has a varying impact on their soul and the effects of the vision according to the position of Satan in it, and the details of the vision, And the life of the visible person. This article provides information about the interpretation of a dream about Satan in the form of a man through a different website.Interpretation of a dream about Satan in the form of a man in a dream. The interpretation of a dream about Satan in the form of a man in a dream varies. The dream interpretation of Satan in the form of an animal in a dream, and the shapes of Satan intersect in the dream, and the meanings of each differ. Visions according to the details of the vision, such as: Seeing Satan in the form of a man in a dream, when the dreamer recites the Holy Qur’an over him and the Satan burns, this means that worries will go away, problems will end and his sadness will go away. Seeing Satan as a person known to the monarch in a dream means hiding. Seeing Satan in a dream as a human being The person who has a vision teaching him the Qur’an indicates authority or leadership over something. Seeing Satan in a dream in the form of a man or an animal, and he was leading people, this indicates a vision of flogging people with his tongue. Seeing Satan in the form of a man and seeing him killing him in a dream means losing bad friends. Seeing Satan in the form of a man in a dream guides and advises insight. It is a warning to him to stay away from bad friends. Seeing Satan in the form of a person or animal in a dream indicates the presence of a deceitful and cunning person who hides his oppression. If you see Satan in the form of a man in a dream and the dreamer follows him, It means that he accompanies the enemy who is conspiring against him. Seeing demons in a dream around someone indicates illicit money and usury. If one sees that he has turned into a demon in a dream, it means that he is a liar, harming people and committing sins. If one sees demons descending upon him in In a dream, it means that he has committed sins and transgressions. Seeing Satan as a man and happiness in a dream indicates that the dreamer is preoccupied with wants and desires. Seeing Satan in the form of a rich man, this indicates the failure of the dreamer and the difficulty of achieving his goals and self-realization. Seeing a demon in the form of an animal in a dream for a farmer It indicates the illness of his flock and crops and his loss to them. Seeing Satan in the form of a woman in a dream means that the dreamer is in love or bewitched. Seeing Satan in the form of a child indicates negative changes and boredom in the dreamer. Interpretation of a dream about Satan in the form of a man in a dream about a single girl. Seeing a demon In the form of a man in a dream for an unmarried girl means that there are thieves waiting for her. Seeing the devil in the form of a man in a dream for an unmarried girl chasing her in a closed place means that she is suffering from the problems she faces. Seeing the devil in the form of a human in a dream, an unmarried girl is following her. Because being around her hurts her. Seeing Satan in the form of a man in a dream for an unmarried girl talking over and over again means the lie she will tell, which will lead to disagreements between people. Interpretation of a dream about Satan in the form of a man in a dream for a married woman

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about a boy being born to a pregnant woman named Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about the birth of a pregnant woman Many people find in the birth of a boy good news for support and a man who will carry the family name and help his father when he grows up, especially in our Arab world where it is customary for a married woman to want to have a male. Satisfying the wife and family more than giving birth to females, so seeing the birth of a boy in a dream is good and happy news as it is in reality and this is what we will mention in our article. Interpretation of a dream about the birth of a pregnant woman by Ibn Sirin What is the interpretation of a dream about the birth of a pregnant woman? In most interpretations, the gender of the newborn in a pregnant woman's dream expresses the opposite of reality. Most scholars interpret the interpretation of the birth of a boy in a dream for a pregnant woman as evidence of the pregnancy of a girl and not a boy. According to the case in which the child appears in the dream after his birth, the dream is interpreted. If the dream of giving birth to a child in a pregnant woman's dream is easy and simple, it expresses the situation in which she lives in peace and psychological and family stability. If a pregnant woman sees that her newborn cries a lot after his birth and is sad about his crying, but she is confused and does not know the reason for his crying. Interpretation of a pregnant woman's dream of giving birth to a boy by Ibn Sirin The scholar Ibn Sirin interprets the dream of giving birth to a boy to a pregnant woman according to the condition in which the boy appears after his birth, as well as the circumstances surrounding the dream and the woman's feelings towards this dream, so that she can conclude that it expresses the dream more accurately. Contrary to what many scholars of interpretation say that the birth of a boy in a pregnant woman's dream is evidence of the birth of a woman, Ibn Sirin believes that the interpretation of the dream of giving birth to a boy can be a sign of that. A pregnant woman gives birth to a male child in some cases. If a pregnant woman sees that she gives birth to a beautiful boy in her dream, she gives him to his father and he is happy with him, then the interpretation of this dream expresses the woman's great desire to give birth, and this is the reason. It also contains good news for her about a male pregnancy. The birth of a handsome boy in a dream for a pregnant woman is a sign of kindness and food that will come to her and her husband after her birth. The Egyptian website is the largest website specialized in interpreting dreams in the Arab world. Just type the Egyptian dream interpretation website on Google and get the correct interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about the birth of a married woman The birth of a child in a dream for a married woman, if she is not pregnant during this period, has a large number of interpretations. Moving to another job that is better for him and his family. The dream of a child born to a married woman may be a sign of her pregnancy, but she does not know it, or a sign of the pregnancy of a close friend of hers who is expecting pregnancy or has problems with childbirth. The ease of giving birth to a child in a dream for a married woman is an easing of matters and a solution to the problems that were an obstacle in her life in raising her children or a sign of fulfilling debts or promises she made to herself. The same. In another interpretation, if the birth of a child in a married woman’s dream is difficult for her, it brings her a bad omen of the coming of periods in which the situation becomes financially or morally difficult for her. The most important interpretations of a pregnant woman’s dream of giving birth Interpretation of a dream of giving birth to a boy and a girl

title: What is the complete interpretation of seeing an octopus in a dream?

preview.html: Trend website offers you what is the interpretation of seeing an octopus. Octopus is a type of marine animal found widely in the seas and oceans. Also, some can see an octopus in a dream as a whole. Therefore, we have collected for you everything related to knowing the complete guide to escaping an octopus in a dream. As well as searching for an octopus in a complete dream, as well as the interpretation of a blue octopus in a complete dream, where we put our favorite octopuses in a complete dream, single and married women, as well as men from books. One of the leading scholars who interpret dreams and visions. Octopus in a lonely dream. The interpretation of an octopus in a dream is complete for a common woman, evidence of her great ability to achieve many aspirations and goals. Seeing a whole white octopus in a dream for a lonely girl means that there is someone who loves her and wants to come to her and enter Her life. Seeing a whole black octopus in a dream indicates the presence of cruel and jealous people for the girl in her life. An octopus attacking a girl in a whole dream means that she will face many problems and obstacles in her later life. But if the octopus completely escapes in a dream, this is a sign of getting rid of all his fears and achieving what he wants. You want. See also: Why dream of a whale in a dream full? Seeing an octopus in a dream full of a married woman. An octopus in a dream is full for a married woman of visions indicating stability and happiness in her married life and a better life. Seeing a full octopus in a dream attacking a married woman is an unpleasant vision and indicates problems in Marriage. In addition to the evidence that she saw an octopus attacking her and hitting her with a sword, this vision shows her divorce from her husband, and God knows best. See also: Why does a shark dream in a dream exactly? What is the dream of an octopus for a pregnant woman? Seeing an octopus in a dream for a pregnant woman is evidence of an easy and economical birth and her health Good before and after childbirth. Some interpretation researchers said that seeing an octopus in the dreamer is evidence that he has given birth to a girl. Eating whole octopus meat in a dream for a pregnant woman is a good vision and indicates that she will collect a lot of goodness and food in her life. See also: Why dream of seeing A whole jellyfish in a dream. Escaping from an octopus in a dream. Escaping from an octopus in a dream is full of benign visions that indicate that the dreamer gets rid of worries and problems in his life and proves that the sorrows are gone. This vision also indicates that the dreamer will get rid of everyone who envies him in his life and will witness victory and liberation from The plot.Catching an octopus in a dream is complete.Catching an octopus in a dream is one of the visions that indicates the wealth that the dreamer has and may gain a lot of money through inheritance.See also: Why do you dream of shrimp in a dream?CompleteWhy do you dream of buying an octopus in a dream?CompleteSeeing eating octopus meat in a dream It is one of the visions that indicate that the dreamer possesses power and status and proves his high position in society. Also, buying a whole black octopus in a dream indicates that many people who hate him will reach the dreamer and prove that he has fallen into disgrace.
